org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore

Interface PartitionExpressionProxy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPartitionExpressionProxy, PartitionExpressionForMetastore

    public interface PartitionExpressionProxy
    The proxy interface that metastore uses for variety of QL operations (metastore can't depend on QL because QL depends on metastore; creating metastore-client module would be a proper way to solve this problem).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String convertExprToFilter(byte[] expr)
      Converts serialized Hive expression into filter in the format suitable for Filter.g.

      Creates SARG from serialized representation.

      Filters the partition names via serialized Hive expression.
      FileFormatProxy getFileFormatProxy(FileMetadataExprType type)
      Gets a separate proxy that can be used to call file-format-specific methods.
      FileMetadataExprType getMetadataType(String inputFormat)
      Determines the file metadata type from input format of the source table or partition.

    • Method Detail

      • convertExprToFilter

        String convertExprToFilter(byte[] expr)
                    throws MetaException
        Converts serialized Hive expression into filter in the format suitable for Filter.g.
        Parameters:
        expr - Serialized expression.
        Returns:
        The filter string.
        Throws:
        MetaException

      • filterPartitionsByExpr

        boolean filterPartitionsByExpr(List<FieldSchema> partColumns,
                               byte[] expr,
                               String defaultPartitionName,
                               List<String> partitionNames)
                        throws MetaException
        Filters the partition names via serialized Hive expression.
        Parameters:
        partColumns - Partition columns in the underlying table.
        expr - Serialized expression.
        defaultPartitionName - Default partition name from job or server configuration.
        partitionNames - Partition names; the list is modified in place.
        Returns:
        Whether there were any unknown partitions preserved in the name list.
        Throws:
        MetaException

      • getMetadataType

        FileMetadataExprType getMetadataType(String inputFormat)
        Determines the file metadata type from input format of the source table or partition.
        Parameters:
        inputFormat - Input format name.
        Returns:
        The file metadata type.

      • getFileFormatProxy

        FileFormatProxy getFileFormatProxy(FileMetadataExprType type)
        Gets a separate proxy that can be used to call file-format-specific methods.
        Parameters:
        type - The file metadata type.
        Returns:
        The proxy.

      • createSarg

        org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.sarg.SearchArgument createSarg(byte[] expr)
        Creates SARG from serialized representation.
        Parameters:
        expr - SARG, serialized as Kryo.
        Returns:
        SARG.
